ValidationRule.description: Validate rule that prevents stage being enrolled and either no due date set or due date is in the past.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( TEXT(StageName) = "Enrolled", $User.Department = "Inside Sales", or ( isnull( Baby_s_Due_Date__c ), AND( ISCHANGED(Baby_s_Due_Date__c), Baby_s_Due_Date__c < Today () ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Baby's Due Date is required and must be a date in the future (greater than today).
